sentences.en: Convolutions frequently alternate in direction of rotation and vary in pitch.
sentences.cn: 盘旋经常改变回转方向和节距.

sentences.en: Crop rotation helps prevent soil erosion.
sentences.cn: 农作物轮作有助于防止水土流失.

sentences.en: He grew a different crop on the same field five years in a row, what researchers call crop rotation.
sentences.cn: 他连续5年在同一块地里种植不同的作物，研究人员称之为轮作。

sentences.en: Once a month we met for the whole day, and in rotation each one led the group.
sentences.cn: 我们每个月聚在一起一整天，轮流担任领队。

sentences.en: Ron's example illuminates an everyday occurrence: job rotation tears apart relational ties.
sentences.cn: 罗恩的例子解释了一件每天都发生的事情: 工作变动撕破了关系的纽带.

sentences.cn: 设置这个矩阵为一个平移、旋转和缩放矩阵。

sentences.en: The base of the tower is restrained against rotation.
The blades spin at 100 rotations per minute.
The cycle sum of the rotation group of the octahedron was calculated.
sentences.cn: 正八面体的旋转群的循环和已算出.

sentences.en: the daily rotation of the earth on its axis
The disks between the vertebrae serve as the pivots of rotation.
sentences.cn: 脊椎之间的基状物起着旋转枢轴的作用.

sentences.en: the diurnal rotation of the earth
The experimental study of molecular rotation is called microwave spectroscopy.
sentences.cn: 分子转动的实验研究被称为微波波谱学.

sentences.en: The numbers of earthworms changed according to the phase of the rotation.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓的数量因轮作状况而有改变.

sentences.en: The rotation of flagella pushes the bacteria through the water.
sentences.cn: 鞭毛的旋转可以推动细菌在水中行进。

sentences.en: The workers in this workshop do day and night shifts in weekly rotation.
sentences.cn: 这个车间的工人上白班和上夜班每周轮换一次.

sentences.en: There are two evident advantages of this type of rotation.
sentences.cn: 这种形式的调动有两个明显的优点.
